about_the_game: This is the demo for Aegis Force: The Scorian War, a pixel art 2.5D tactical RPG set on the fantasy continent of Ianua. Players will recruit and lead the Aegis Force on a journey to end the Scorian War and save the citizens of the continent. This is a story rich RPG with battles taking place on a grid that allows for engaging strategic decisions.
